name: Raices del mal
description:
ES:
No dejes que las palabras del man tomen raices, usa tus palabras de poder para reperlerlas!

Raices del mal es un juego donde debes teclear los antonimos rapidamente y evita que el mal tome raiz !

EN:
Don't let the evil words take root, use your power words to defeat them !

Raices del mal (Roots of evil), is a game in which type must the antonyms of the given words as fast as possible and prevent evil from taking root !
